summary.span: 提供有关工作流实例中发生的未处理异常的信息。

span.span: Provides information about an unhandled exception that occurred in a workflow instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果异常由某个活动引发并且未经处理，则默认行为是终止该工作流实例。If an exception is thrown by an activity and is unhandled, the default behavior is to terminate the workflow instance. 如果存在 处理程序，则它会重写此默认行为。If an handler is present, it can override this default behavior. 通过此处理程序，工作流宿主作者能够提供合适的处理操作，例如自定义日志记录、中止工作流、取消工作流或终止工作流。This handler gives the workflow host author an opportunity to provide the appropriate handling, such as custom logging, aborting the workflow, canceling the workflow, or terminating the workflow. ## Examples 下面的示例调用了引发异常的工作流。The following example invokes a workflow that throws an exception. 工作流未处理异常，并且 处理程序已被调用。The exception is unhandled by the workflow and the handler is invoked. 将检查 以提供有关异常的信息，且终止工作流。The are inspected to provide information about the exception, and the workflow is terminated. [!code-csharp[CFX_WorkflowApplicationExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/cfx_workflowapplicationexample/cs/program.cs#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ExceptionSource As Activity
public: property System::Activities::Activity ^ ExceptionSource { System::Activities::Activity ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取作为未处理异常的源的活动。

span.span: Gets the activity that is the source of the unhandled exception.

summary.span: 获取作为未处理异常源的活动实例的唯一标识符。

span.span: Gets the unique identifier of the activity instance that is the source of the unhandled exception.

value.span: 作为未处理异常源的活动实例的唯一标识符。
